overview: William Higgins' longtime cameraman Dan Allman was assigned the duty of shooting some loops for the West Hollywood peep show booths, and in the process he discovered a new superstar named Lance. The little gem  also features some of the most amazing cumshots ever to grace the screen!

title: Good Times Coming
